modName: Child clothes for adult based children-My little addon
summary: this mod allow you to give child clothes for adult based children such as Ma\'Rakha, Maisha, Ram-Ku
descriptionHtml:
this mod is add on for \"My little\" series mods 

 
 mod will allow you to give child clothes for adult based children such as Ma\'Rakha,Ram-Ku
also it would compatible with other any mod that add adaptable kid who wears adult clothes(so it\' will compatible with Maisha too)


what this mod do

when you give child clothes to moded kid. they will wear proper adult clothes that match up with color.

man clothes is smaller and skinnier than any other vanilla outfit ,

woman clothes have flat  chest than any other vanilla outfit 


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
known bugs

this mod is pretty buggy but it\'s not that serious. 

1. some times randomly they would  change their clothes to their default outfit . in this case, you can find child clothes that you gave to kid on their box. grab it and give it to child again.

2. some times even you give clothes they will not change their outfit.  in this case,  you can find child clothes that you gave to kid on their box again. grab it and give it to child again. 

3. some times when you give clothes. they will be come naked .  in this case,  you can find child clothes that you gave to kid on their box again!!!. grab it and give it to child again.

so... the point is you have to give child clothes to them several times repeatedly  until they  got dress up. 


Requirement

Hearth fire


etc

about Ma\'Rakha , he will take of his hat when you give clothes to him, but when you go out side and get back to interior he will wear his hat again.
author: Ryeong
